title: How to set my APN for free internet - Quora

response.answer_text: Nahh, No way, You can't. APN is not the way of getting free internet. You can say it play a role to transfer internet from isp to device. But in some cases, ISP has many loop holes in there server, So, by tunneling (VPN) it is possible, But only when your ISP is newbie or doesn't popular or when ISP have not enough money to manage top level security.
There is nothing to set. If a source is FREE you simply do not need a username/password to connect.
